full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI ZHI BA'I SBYIN SREG YE SHES 'OD 'BAR GYI LAG LEN GSAL BAR BRJOD PA ZUR RGYAN 'OD 'BAR SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(RIG 'DZIN PADMA 'PHRIN LAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB LA BRTEN PA'I ZHI BA'I SBYIN SREG YE SHES 'OD 'BAR GYI LAG LEN GSAL BAR BRJOD PA, ZUR RGYAN 'OD 'BAR SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA @016B 'DI NYID, STONG 'KHOR MANYDZU SHRI LNGA BA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS ZIN THO LTA BUR MDZAD NAS SBYAR BYANG SOGS MA GNANG 'DUG PAS, DPE RGYUN KYANG MA 'PHEL SHING THOG MA'I ZIN BRIS KYI DPE A YANG YIG MKHAN GYI SKYON GYIS LHAG CHAD YIG NOR MANG DU 'DUG PAS DPYAD BZOD PA RNAMS ZUNG ZAD BCOS TE YE SHES 'OD 'BAR GYIS STEN NAS LAG LEN BYED 'DOD PA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I BSAM PAS ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS PAR DU SGRUB PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SVA STI, ,TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,CES SH'A SA DHA RAS SUG BRUS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,)
